name: Random-quote-generator
tagline: A web application that generates random quote.
body:
### # Random Quote Generator
This application generates random quote on click of a button.
I created this application as a web development project for [Free Code Camp](http://freecodecamp.com/)
### Technologies Used
For the making of this application, I used HTML/CSS/BOOTSTRAP for styling and making the webpage.
The whole functionality is build using javascript and jquery.

***


### # How does it work
On click of a button, a random quote appears on the screen.
The quote is selected from a pre-defined set of Quotes in the array.
Jquery manages the triggers as well as animation that goes with it.
### Authors and Contributors
This web application was created by Shikhar kapila.
You can reach him by:
* Email : [kap.shikhar@gmail.com](kap.shikhar@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
